metadata.description: Persona-focused ClimateGPT prompts for regression testing

questions.prompt: Identify the top three countries with the largest increase in transport emissions between 2020 and 2023. Highlight priority areas for mitigation.
Evaluate the reliability of EDGAR v2024 monthly power-sector data for France in 2022 and discuss any methodological caveats.
questions.notes: Expect references to data provenance and uncertainty.

questions.prompt: Summarise the most recent signals in US state-level industrial-combustion emissions, focusing on concentration and momentum.
questions.notes: Should surface concentration metrics and direction of change.

questions.prompt: Explain how Germany's power-sector emissions changed in 2023 compared with 2022 in simple terms.
Compare 2023 transport emissions for Florida and Illinois and describe what the difference means.
questions.notes: Shared prompt to evaluate persona tone differences.

questions.prompt: Describe seasonal patterns in Tokyo's city-level waste emissions for 2021 and indicate how a policy team might respond.
questions.notes: Shared prompt emphasising different audience needs.
